file_content.text: Doctor Orlian? I'm with the Republic. We're getting you out of here.
Who are you? Where's Meldo? He said he was going to get me out of here.
He never mentioned anything about sending someone else. How do I know this isn't a trick?
If I was working for the Empire, why would I have killed the guards?
Hmm... it does seem a little extreme. Okay, I guess I can trust you.
I guess I really don't have much choice in the matter, do I?
You're free to sit here and wait for more guards to show up if you don't believe me.
When you put it like that, I guess I don't have a lot of options.
The Imperials are sure to send reinforcements. You have to hold them off so I can meet Meldo at the rendezvous.
Please. I don't know anything. I just work here.
